channel.title: Webclient Trouble
channel.description:
Okay, so i've been faced with this problem for a couple days now and i need it fixed, i'm 80% sure the problem is my java of some sort but i want to ask you guys what the problem is, i'm happy to teamview, skype idc.
Okay so i've successfully jarred and signed my client through jarr maker through jdk 8 and jdk 7 to see if theres any difference. i test it out on my website http://www.cryptic317.com/webclient.html and get a loading error with says its missing a massifest attribute and i have no idea what that means, [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZK3MdwW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/8dHuIFz.png[/img]
Now i'm not sure what the problem is, ive compiled the client with both jdk7 and 8 and no difference at all, if anyone can help it would be great and i'm sure we could sort something out on skype or teamviewer
-Jaximus

item.title: Webclient Trouble
item.dc:creator: @jaximus jaximus

Okay, so i’ve been faced with this problem for a couple days now and i need it fixed, i’m 80% sure the problem is my java of some sort but i want to ask you guys what the problem is, i’m happy to teamview, skype idc.
